scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Paul
scrape.text: Just wasn't for me, I guess. Found myself turning pages to get to the end instead of turning pages to get to the conclusion - thought The Reluctant Fundamentalist was a better take on the same unreliable narrator device. A little boring and predictable, but could also be partially the result of heightened expectations. There really was a lot of buzz surrounding this one, but sadly I just didn't think it was anything noteworthy.
